fullText:
Double Team

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlord
Benefit: When making a melee attack, you can take a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, another ally adjacent to the target gains a +3 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 368, page(s) 58.
